column5: Our place is close to NRG Stadium, the Medical Center, Rice University, Rice Village (Nightlife and Shopping), and Downtown Destinations. We have plenty of board games and vintage consoles to occupy your time and the patio is great for pregaming. Easily Uber around town for the diverse nightlife and bar scenes. Youâ€™ll love our place because of the location, gated community, amenities, and the vast amount of parking available.
